column1: You must go on a mission to defeat terrorists with your crush.
column2: You must go on a pilgrimmage to a Tibetan monestary with your crush and live in the mountains there with them for 10 years.
column3: You and your crush must be the first people on Mars.
column4: You and your crush must infiltrate a drug smuggling ring.
column5: Your crush's evil doppelganger arrives and you must determine which one to shoot.
column6: You and your crush get transported back in time to 10,000 BC with no way of returning to the present.
column7: You and your crush become crime kingpins.
column8: You and your crush must pilot giant mechs to battle an alien invasion.
column9: You and your crush get convicted of crimes you didn't commit and must share a prison cell for life.
